parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The ETH address of the owner of the assets.

200.description: Returns a list of nfts for Moonbirds collection.

500.description: Returns an error if alchemy service breaks.
Returns an error if pay service breaks.
Returns an error if email service breaks.

info.title: Moonbirds | Data API
info.description: Moonbirds api for retrieve assets on collection

raw.description: uri representing the location of the NFTs original metadata blob. This is a backup for you to parse when the metadata field is not automatically populated.

gateway.description: public gateway uri for the raw uri above.

description.description: human-readable description of the NFT asset. (Markdown is supported/rendered on OpenSea and other NFT platforms).

image.description: URL to the NFT asset image. Can be standard URLs pointing to images on conventional servers, IPFS, or Arweave. Most types of images (SVGs, PNGs, JPEGs, etc.) are supported by NFT marketplaces.

metadata.description: relevant metadata for NFT contract. This is useful for viewing image url, traits, etc. without having to follow the metadata url in tokenUri to parse manually.

error.description: A string describing a particular reason that we were unable to fetch complete metadata for the NFT.

totalCount.description: The total number of nfts list (differ from the NFTs length).

address.description: The ETH address of the owner of the assets.

nftAddress.description: The ETH address of the NFT.

successURL.description: The URL when the payment was correct.

cancelURL.description: The URL when the payment was canceled.

ok.description: Returns the status of validation, ok if success.

message.description: Returns the validation message for transaction, it will return an error if exists.

sessionID.description: The payment token id in success page
